Summary: Multiple unidentified flying objects over mountains.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving down charleston towards jones, on my way home from the grocery store. i tend to look at the sky frequently and noticed 4 blinking(they were blinking rather quickly, actually) lights over the mountain. i'd driven down this road in the evening before and had never seen the lights, but i didn't suspect anything weird, i assumed it was one of those light things they put on the top of mountains so that planes don't crash into them. then they began to move and i quickly threw that assumption out the window. they began separating and 3 of them headed to the left (my left), two of them disappeared and one remained much further than where it started (i can't remember whether or not the other one stayed in the original place, i think it may have). i kept my focus on that one for a good minute, and began thinking maybe they were helicopters. though i don't recall helicopters blinking that quickly, or being able to disappear that fast. i was a little more curious, but still wasn't thinking it was anything too crazy. my focus went back to the original area where i think there were a couple more objects hanging there... i watched then suddenly there were 3, 4, 5, 6, 7. i lost count after 7, because a few objects seem to be blinking in and out of vision. it was a huge cluster, nothing like i've seen. they began making formations, they made about 3-4, maybe 5... i saw a couple of planes\helicopters (it was so far away, it was really hard to tell what i was seeing) fly in that were definitely something i could place as ours. by the time i hit jones, they had mostly separated and dissappeared. though there were some sporadically placed about the sky. i was enthused that the light turn red and i could focus much more on the sky. there ended up being on in the sky sort of above my truck, though, very, very high. in the same height an airplane could be seen at, but it appeared much smaller and i saw no wings, it was still blinking, though much more slowly. it appeared to be white (white light, silver, i don't know.) and was just kind of cruising through the sky. i don't know if it was extraterrestrial or government, but it was totally cool either way and i was happy to see it! unfortunately, i didn't have my camera on me.
